Horrible glitch at 01:50

If nothing shows up to replace, I can fix the "out of sync" part, cool thing about AVI that.

AVIGUY
Let's all stop downloading and seeding this and jump over to the next available non-shitty rip.

Spoke prematurely. Can't subject people to a whole three seconds of silence (and then back .4) just to put it in sync. Just not worth the effort.

AVIGUY
Bad source is BAD after 1:30. Forget the 720p too, as they are obviously from the same source.
If you skip past the glitch, and your media player allows you to (like MPC Media Player Classic), you can shift the audio 2500 milliseconds to correct the sync issue.
completely out of sync, could not watch

thank you VTV!
if one uses KMP-Player do this after the glitch occured:
1. right click on the screen
2. go to playback | audio resync
3. hit +0,5s five times and +50ms twice
4. enjoy ;-)
